bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Preparation of Excitation System Specifications
IEEE Guide for the Preparation of Excitation System Specifications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide is intended to provide to the specification writer the information to prepare a specification for the purchase of an excitation system. This guide is presented in narrative form with descriptions of functions typical of excitation systems. Narrative is provided describing types of excitation systems and information required for sizing the excitation system.
